string-array.name: affirmations_array
string-array.item: I am worthy of love and respect.
I am capable of achieving my goals.
I trust my intuition and make wise decisions.
I am strong and resilient.
I am grateful for everything in my life.
I believe in myself and my abilities.
I radiate positivity and attract good things.
I am confident in my unique talents and skills.
I am deserving of happiness and success.
I am surrounded by supportive and loving people.
I am in control of my thoughts and emotions.
I forgive myself and others easily.
I am worthy of abundance and prosperity.
I am constantly improving and growing.
I am at peace with myself and my past.
I am always learning and expanding my knowledge.
I am grateful for my body and treat it with kindness.
I am worthy of respect and admiration.
I trust the universe to guide me towards my path.
I am open to new opportunities and experiences.
I am free of negative self-talk and limiting beliefs.
I am grateful for my unique qualities and personality.
I am kind and compassionate towards myself and others.
I am confident in my ability to handle challenges.
I am worthy of love and affection.
I am successful in all areas of my life.
I am living my best life.
I am constantly attracting positive energy.
I am worthy of achieving my dreams.
I am proud of my accomplishments.
I am surrounded by abundance and prosperity.
I am confident in my ability to achieve my goals.
I am worthy of respect and admiration.
I am grateful for the challenges that make me stronger.
I am surrounded by positive and supportive people.
I am a magnet for good things.
I am in charge of my own happiness.
I am confident in my ability to create the life I want.
I am grateful for my experiences and lessons learned.
I am worthy of success and prosperity.
I am loved unconditionally.
I am patient and trust the timing of my life.
I am worthy of trust and honesty from others.
I am constantly improving my mindset and attitude.
I am capable of overcoming any obstacle.
I am grateful for the abundance in my life.
I am confident in my own abilities and skills.
I am worthy of respect and kindness from others.
I am creating a life that brings me joy and fulfillment.
I am at peace with my past and excited for my future.
I am capable of achieving my dreams.
I am worthy of love and affection from others.
I am surrounded by positive and loving relationships.
I am grateful for my inner strength and resilience.
I am confident in my own beauty and worth.
I am worthy of success and happiness.
I am surrounded by opportunities for growth and learning.
I am deserving of all the good things in life.
I am constantly improving and evolving.
I am worthy of kindness and compassion from others.
I am grateful for my body and treat it with love.
I am confident in my own creativity and imagination.
I am worthy of trust and respect from others.
I am living a life that reflects my values and passions.
I am surrounded by abundance and prosperity.
I am capable of achieving anything I set my mind to.
I am grateful for the opportunities to learn and grow.
I am worthy of love and respect.
I am capable of achieving anything I set my mind to.
I am strong, confident, and resilient.
I choose to focus on the good in every situation.
I am grateful for everything in my life.
I trust in my abilities and instincts.
I am surrounded by positive energy and love.
I let go of negative thoughts and emotions.
I am worthy of success and happiness.
I radiate love and positivity wherever I go.
I am blessed with abundance and prosperity.
I am patient, kind, and compassionate towards myself and others.
I am healthy, vibrant, and full of energy.
I am proud of myself and my accomplishments.
I forgive myself and others for past mistakes.
I am at peace with myself and the world around me.
I am in control of my thoughts and emotions.
I am deserving of love, joy, and abundance.
I trust that everything happens for a reason.
I attract positive people and opportunities into my life.
I am grateful for my body and all that it does for me.
I am worthy of self-care and self-love.
I am blessed with endless possibilities and opportunities.
I am confident in my abilities and talents.
I am open to learning and growth.
I choose to see the beauty in everything and everyone.
I am surrounded by abundance and prosperity.
I am grateful for the present moment and all that it holds.
I am loved, appreciated, and valued.
I trust the journey of my life.
I release all fear and embrace love.
I am capable of overcoming any obstacle.
I am filled with joy, peace, and gratitude
